text: PUMA AG is a German multinational company. The company designs and manufactures athletic and casual footwear, apparel and accessories.The headquarter is in Herzogenaurach, Bavaria, Germany. Puma is the third largest sportswear manufacturer in the world. The logo of Puma is puma jumping through the title or just jumping. It is estimated that Puma employs about 14,606 people worldwide and distributes its products in more than 120 countries. == References == Category:1920s establishments in Germany Category:1924 establishments in Europe Category:Clothing companies Category:Bavaria Category:Manufacturing companies of Germany
title: Puma (brand)
